summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4919 for the improvement of Donovan Street from 5th Avenue South to 8th Avenue South, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56366 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
